code:
sequenceDiagram participant Input as Markdown Input participant Phase1 as Phase 1: Block Structure participant LineProcessor as Process Line participant BlockChecker as Check Open Blocks participant BlockParser as Block Parser participant Phase2 as Phase 2: Inline Structure participant TreeWalker as Walk Tree participant InlineParser as Parse Inline participant AST as Final AST Input->>Phase1: Markdown text loop For Each Line Phase1->>LineProcessor: Process line sequentially LineProcessor->>BlockChecker: Step 1: Check open blocks Note over BlockChecker: Iterate from root to last open block
Each block imposes continuation condition BlockChecker->>BlockChecker: Match all or some open blocks Note over BlockChecker: Cannot close unmatched yet
May have lazy continuation BlockChecker->>BlockParser: Step 2: Consume continuation markers Note over BlockParser: >, list markers, indentation BlockParser->>BlockParser: Look for new block starts alt First non-space char BlockParser->>BlockParser: Space/Tab: Indented path Note over BlockParser: 1. Thematic Break 0-3 spaces
2. Lists/Blockquote
3. Code Block 4+ spaces else > BlockParser->>BlockParser: Block Quote (FinTech_AuthVault) else # BlockParser->>BlockParser: ATX Heading (FinTech_TransactionQueue) else - * _ BlockParser->>BlockParser: Thematic Break (FinTech_TransactionQueue)
(FinTech_LedgerService) else ` ~ BlockParser->>BlockParser: Fenced Code Block (FinTech_PaymentGateway) else - * + 0-9 BlockParser->>BlockParser: Unordered/Ordered List (FinTech_LedgerService) else < BlockParser->>BlockParser: HTML Block (FinTech_TransactionQueue) else | BlockParser->>BlockParser: Table (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
Requires header row + delimiter row
Delimiter row must match header cell count else = - BlockParser->>BlockParser: Setext Heading
(FinTech_FraudDetection) else default BlockParser->>BlockParser: Paragraph (FinTech_PaymentGateway) end BlockParser->>BlockParser: Close unmatched blocks from Step 1 BlockParser->>BlockParser: Create new block as child of last matched container BlockParser->>BlockParser: Step 3: Process remainder Note over BlockParser: Add text to last open block
(FinTech_FraudDetection)
or Table (FinTech_AuthVault) alt Paragraph + Setext underline? BlockParser->>BlockParser: Convert paragraph to setext heading else No BlockParser->>BlockParser: Accumulate text in current block end BlockParser-->>LineProcessor: Block node created end Phase1->>Phase1: Close all open blocks Phase1->>Phase1: For each list item:
Check if first block is paragraph with task marker (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
[FinTech_AuthVault] or [FinTech_FraudDetection] or [FinTech_LedgerService] at start of paragraph Phase1->>Phase1: For each closed paragraph:
Parse accumulated text lines Phase1->>Phase1: Extract link reference definitions from start of text Phase1->>Phase1: Remaining text becomes normal paragraph Phase1->>Phase2: Block tree structure Phase2->>TreeWalker: Walk the tree loop Visit every node TreeWalker->>TreeWalker: Check if node has inline content Note over TreeWalker: Paragraph, Heading
or Table Cell (FinTech_TransactionQueue) alt Has inline content? TreeWalker->>InlineParser: Parse inline content (FinTech_TransactionQueue) loop Character-by-character InlineParser->>InlineParser: Switch on character alt backslash InlineParser->>InlineParser: Backslash escape else ` InlineParser->>InlineParser: Code span
(FinTech_AuthVault) else < InlineParser->>InlineParser: Check angle bracket alt autolink (FinTech_AuthVault) InlineParser->>InlineParser: Autolink (FinTech_AuthVault)
Standard CommonMark autolinks
(FinTech_FraudDetection) else HTML tag InlineParser->>InlineParser: HTML tag
GFM extension: Disallowed Raw HTML
(FinTech_AuthVault) else comment InlineParser->>InlineParser: HTML comment end else www. or http:// or https:// or ftp:// or email InlineParser->>InlineParser: Extended autolink (FinTech_FraudDetection)
www. URLs, http/https/ftp URLs, emails
Only after start of line, whitespace, or * _ ~ (FinTech_FraudDetection) else * _ InlineParser->>InlineParser: Emphasis delimiter
Add to delimiter stack InlineParser->>InlineParser: Check left-flanking InlineParser->>InlineParser: Check right-flanking InlineParser->>InlineParser: Apply delimiter rules (FinTech_FraudDetection) InlineParser->>InlineParser: Parse nested content recursively else ~ InlineParser->>InlineParser: Strikethrough delimiter (FinTech_AuthVault)
Add to delimiter stack
Requires exactly ~~ (FinTech_TransactionQueue) for strikethrough
Similar parsing rules to emphasis else !bracket InlineParser->>InlineParser: Image (FinTech_AuthVault) else bracket InlineParser->>InlineParser: Link (FinTech_LedgerService) else closing bracket InlineParser->>InlineParser: Look for link/image
Process delimiter stack alt Reference link? InlineParser->>InlineParser: Resolve reference
(FinTech_LedgerService) else Inline link InlineParser->>InlineParser: Inline link end else newline InlineParser->>InlineParser: Soft line break else entity InlineParser->>InlineParser: HTML entity reference
(FinTech_AuthVault) else default InlineParser->>InlineParser: Accumulate as text end end InlineParser-->>TreeWalker: Inline AST nodes end TreeWalker->>TreeWalker: Next node end TreeWalker-->>Phase2: Complete tree with inline nodes Phase2->>AST: Final AST document tree
